en.title: Application submitted
en.emailSentConfirmation: You have been sent a confirmation by email.
en.line1: An email has been sent to the applicant, that explains what happens next.
en.line2: Please contact online_application@justice.gov.uk if you do not receive the email.
en.line3: What did you think of this service?

cy.title: Application submitted (in welsh)
cy.emailSentConfirmation: You have been sent a confirmation by email. (in welsh)
cy.line1: An email has been sent to the applicant, that explains what happens next. (in welsh)
cy.line2: Please contact online_application@justice.gov.uk if you do not receive the email. (in welsh)
cy.line3: What did you think of this service? (in welsh)
